game.name: Shining Plume
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 트레이딩 카드, 컨트롤러 일부 지원, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Shining Plume is a tale filled with adventure, joy, sorrow, friendship and love, from Warfare Studios (Vagrant Hearts, Valiant: Resurrection).
game.shortDescriptionEn: Shining Plume is a tale filled with adventure, joy, sorrow, friendship and love, from Warfare Studios (Vagrant Hearts, Valiant: Resurrection).
